string.value: After listening to Tae Roon's story, Tae Soo felt that since he owes Tae Roon a debt of gratitude, he wanted to give him a Peach from this farm. How can I successfully give Tae Soo's Peach to Tae Roon? Maybe there's a place to drop the Peach at the #bWild Bear Area#k...

A small note of thank you on the table... after handing Tae Soo the note, he flashed a big smile so genuine he must have felt like flying. This small piece of paper may well be the truth about Tae Roon.
Hello traveler! Have you met No Gong? Did he tell you anything about the bear?
...ahh... I see. So HE's Tae Roon... I've heard about him before, a student from Mu Lung who lost his mind through the evil spells of Master Goblin...
But I didn't know there was such a heartbreaking story behind all this. I do know that anyone who has a heart of gold like him should be able to overcome the spell of Master Goblin.

Before that... I wanted to say thanks for all the help, and... here's a box of Peaches for him. I don't know how to get this to him, and based on what you've told me, it may not be easy to approach him, so... Can you please help me out once more?

Thank you so much. I think facing Tae Roon again will be difficult, so... anyway, he should be wandering around #bWild Bear Area#k, so if you can #bdrop the peach somewhere around there#k, then don't you think he'll pick it up? You can find the spot where Tae Roon will most likely pick up the Peach..
I understand if you find it difficult to do. I owe you a lot already for what you've done.

Hey... this is ... it's written by Tae Roon! Wow... I really didn't expect him to write a thank you letter from him. He really is a nice guy. I really hope he gets to escape that evil spell of Master Goblin's...
Thank you so much for your help, traveler. I'll have to drop some Peaches there at the Wild Bear Area for Tae Roon from time to time. I'm sure he'll be very happy with it.
How about giving Tae Roon a Peach yourself? He'll make sure to properly thank you for your work.
I don't think you have given Tae Roon the Peaches yet. If you have lost the Peach I have you last time, then it's okay to pick one of these Peaches at the farm and give it to him.

Whaaaat? You lost the Peach? Sigh... please don't tell me you ate it all. The Peach is for Tae Roon, so I'll give you another one, but... please be careful with it. Tae Sang told it it's okay to take a couple from the farm, but ... I'm sure he will be mad if anyone takes a whole bunch from his farm.
